archimate:Resource.name: Business Rules Manager
archimate:Resource.documentation: This ABB is responsible for defining, distributing, and maintaining business rules and their correlation to policies. The appropriate resulting policies are defined by using a Policy Manager ABB. This ABB supports rule implementation across multiple SOA RA layers.

properties.value: This ABB is responsible for defining, distributing, and maintaining business rules and their correlation to policies. The appropriate resulting policies are defined by using a Policy Manager ABB. This ABB supports rule implementation across multiple SOA RA layers.
